alert.note: Alert for Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 2:38AM EDT until July 11 at 11:17AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hoosic River At Williamstown. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Most of Cole Field is inundated, as well as the portion of Stetson Road that runs along Cole Field. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 10.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hoosic River Williamstown Flood Stage: 9.0 Observed Stage at Mon 2 am: 8.5 Forecast: Mon 8 am 10.8 Mon 2 pm 10.7 Mon 8 pm 9.9 Tue 2 am 9.6 Tue 8 am 8.5 Tue 2 pm 7.8 Tue 8 pm 7.5 Wed 2 am 7.3 Wed 8 am 7.1 Wed 2 pm 6.9 Wed 8 pm 6.8 &&
